text: Stenoptilia elkefi is a moth of the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Tunisia, Cyprus, southern Europe, Jordan, Turkey, Turkmenistan and Yemen. The wingspan is 17–19 mm.Neue palaearktische Pterophoridae (Lep., Pterophoridae, Platyptiliinae) ==References== elkefi Category:Moths described in 1984 Category:Moths of the Arabian Peninsula Category:Plume moths of Africa Category:Plume moths of Asia Category:Plume moths of Europe Category:Taxa named by Ernst Arenberger
title: Stenoptilia elkefi
